DataElement.preferredName: Study Chair Principal Investigator Agreement Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Agreement or Disagreement of the Study Chair with assessment(s) made by a study Principal Investigator.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Agreement of the Study Chair with assessment(s) made by a study Principal Investigator.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical study.:A chairperson is the officer who presides at the meetings of an organization, committee, or other organizational structure.

Concepts.definition: A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical study.
The officer who presides at the meetings of an organization, committee, or other organizational structure.

Property.preferredDefinition: An investigator who is responsible for all aspects of the conduct of a study.:1. The act of agreeing. 2. Harmony of opinion; accord. (from American Heritage Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An investigator who is responsible for all aspects of the conduct of a study.
The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

DataElementConcept.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 6/1/12 - Released as part of content cleanup task; CDE used by AE-CIP and SAE Reporting-caBIG CSIs.  jc   7/7/11 - Retired due to lack of use in active CDEs.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Agreement or disagreement with a document or activity.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 6/1/12 - Released as part of content cleanup task; CDE used by AE-CIP and SAE Reporting-caBIG CSIs.  jc
